member.name: T:Ma.Services.Appointments.AppointmentsController
member.summary: Represents an appointment controller.

member.name: M:Ma.Services.Appointments.AppointmentsController.Get(System.String)
member.summary: Get appointments by unique user id.

member.name: T:Ma.Services.Appointments.DTO.AppointmentItem
member.summary: Represents an appointment item.

member.name: P:Ma.Services.Appointments.DTO.AppointmentItem.Id
member.summary: Gets or sets the unique id of this appointment.

member.name: P:Ma.Services.Appointments.DTO.AppointmentItem.UserId
member.summary: Gets or sets the user id who has created this appointment.

member.name: P:Ma.Services.Appointments.DTO.AppointmentItem.Title
member.summary: Gets or sets the short title of the appointment.

member.name: P:Ma.Services.Appointments.DTO.AppointmentItem.IsBirthday
member.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the appointment is a birthday.

member.name: P:Ma.Services.Appointments.DTO.AppointmentItem.Repetitions
member.summary: Specifies how often the appointment should be re-evaluated.

member.name: P:Ma.Services.Appointments.DTO.AppointmentItem.Notes
member.summary: Gets or sets the notes to the appointment.

member.name: P:Ma.Services.Appointments.DTO.AppointmentItem.ReferenceDate
member.summary: Gets or sets the reference date used for appointment. It can be fixed date or the date of birth.

member.name: P:Ma.Services.Appointments.DTO.AppointmentItem.RemindeBeforeDays
member.summary: Gets or sets the value which will be used to remind in n day(s) before the appointment happens.

member.name: P:Ma.Services.Appointments.DTO.AppointmentItem.RemindeBeforeWeeks
member.summary: Gets or sets the value which will be used to remind in n week(s) before the appointment happens.

member.name: T:Ma.Services.Appointments.MigrationExtensions
member.summary: Represents the extensions for data EF migrations.

member.name: M:Ma.Services.Appointments.MigrationExtensions.AutoMigrateDatabase(Microsoft.AspNetCore.Builder.IApplicationBuilder)
member.summary: Migrate pending database changes.
